============
simplereader
============


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/simplereader.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/simplereader

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/haddad-github/simplereader.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.com/haddad-github/simplereader

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/simplereader/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://simplereader.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?version=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status


.. image:: https://pyup.io/repos/github/haddad-github/simplereader/shield.svg
     :target: https://pyup.io/repos/github/haddad-github/simplereader/
     :alt: Updates



Reads data and manipulates data from CSV easily, also includes statistics functions


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://simplereader.readthedocs.io.
